Jan 27 (Reuters) - Abrdn PLC ABDN.L:

  • ABRDN PLC - PROPOSED SECONDARY PLACING

  • ABRDN PLC - ANNOUNCES PROPOSED SALE OF APPROXIMATELY 40 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES OF ITS SHAREHOLDING IN PHOENIX GROUP HOLDINGS PLC

  • ABRDN PLC - ABRDN INTENDS TO RETURN NET PROCEEDS OF PLACING TO SHAREHOLDERS

  • ABRDN - PRICE/PLACING SHARE WILL BE DETERMINED BY AN ABB PROCESS TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS FACILITATED BY GOLDMAN SACHS INTERNATIONAL

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: ABDN.L
